nodes.documentation:
@dev transfer money to the below:
10% of challenger's amount back to original challenger
40% of challenger's amount to sponsors (and 100% refund to sponsors)
25% of challenger's amount to contract owner
25% of challenger's amount to challenge group owner
nodes.name: _handleFailedChallenge

abortChallenge(string).details: abort challenge. Only yourself can give up the challenge.

completeDailyChallenges(string,address,u.details: complete multiple daily challenges. Only challenger and group agent can run.

finishChallenge(string,address).details: finish challenge. Anyone can help finish any challenge.

groupWithdraw(string).details: withdraw the balance of challenge group. Only group owner can withdraw.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

ownerWithdraw().details: withdraw the balance of owner. Only contract owner can withdraw.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
